ops.js:
showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:66}); // {Tifa}
“What are you so happy about, Professor?
You know what this means, don't you?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:67}); // {Tifa}
“{Cloud} has the Black Materia!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:68}); // {Tifa}
“Sephiroth is going to summon Meteor!
Every single person is going to die!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:25}); // {Barret}
“Hey!
We're here to help you!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:30}); // {Barret}
“It's safe.
I have it.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:35}); // {Barret}
“Okay then, here.
Had a lot of pressure holding this thing.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:71}); // {Barret}
“Yo! {Cloud}!
Stop! Don't do it!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:26}); // {Red XIII}
“I'm here!
I'm here to help you, {Cloud}!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:31}); // {Red XIII}
“It's safe.
I'm holding on to it.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:34}); // {Red XIII}
“Are you all right, {Cloud}?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:36}); // {Red XIII}
“Then…here you go.
I was a little apprehensive holding this thing.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:72}); // {Red XIII}
“{Cloud}, NO!
Stop! Please!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:6}); // Rufus
“Everything's as I imagined it to be.
Isn't it splendid?”{PAUSE}“It is that kind of dullness
that makes you a second-rate scientist.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:11}); // Rufus
“What does this mean?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:14}); // Rufus
“I never saw that report…
Where is it?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:16}); // Rufus
“You keep a lot of things to yourself.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:18}); // Rufus
“Hmm…maybe we should
go back to our ship now.”{PAUSE}“We need to prepare for
the inspection anyway.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:22}); // Rufus
“Leave things to you?
Hmph…I don't know what you mean.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:69}); // Rufus
“Whatever I say now is too little…
too late. We must evacuate.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:70}); // Rufus
“I want you all to come with me.
There's still much more I want to know.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:4}); // Rufus
“The outside is rich with Mako energy.
The inside is a
treasure trove of Materia.
This truly is the Promised Land.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:5}); // Hojo
“There is no such thing
as the Promised Land.
It's a legend…an old wives tale…
…It's utterly ridiculous.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:8}); // Scarlet
“It's coming from within the wall!
Something's in there! It's moving!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:17}); // Scarlet
“Mr. President…
I've got a bad feeling about this place…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:19}); // Scarlet
“Hey!!!
Where did you come from?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:10}); // Hojo
“Then it really does exist…
I didn't believe in it.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:12}); // Hojo
“…Weapon.
A monster created by the Planet.”{PAUSE}“They appear when the Planet's in danger
and destroy everything.”{PAUSE}“That's what was stated in
Professor Gast's report.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:49}); // Hojo
“Ha,ha,ha…
this is perfect!!!”{PAUSE}“It means that my experiment was
a complete success.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:50}); // Hojo
“What number were you?
Huh? Where is your tattoo?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:53}); // Hojo
“What the--?
You mean only a failure
made it here?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:55}); // Hojo
“Shut up, miserable failure…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:64}); // Hojo
“Did you see it!! It's Sephiroth!
So he IS here!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:65}); // Hojo
“This is perfect!
Both Jenova's Reunion and Sephiroth's will!”{PAUSE}“They won't be diffused
into the Lifestream,”{PAUSE}“but gathered here!
Mwa, haa, ha…”

dialogStrings: Inside Northern Cave
NOJIMA

Scarlet
“Wow!! That's amazing!”

Scarlet
“It's all Materia!!”

Rufus
“The outside is rich with Mako energy.
The inside is a
treasure trove of Materia.
This truly is the Promised Land.”

Hojo
“There is no such thing
as the Promised Land.
It's a legend…an old wives tale…
…It's utterly ridiculous.”

Rufus
“Everything's as I imagined it to be.
Isn't it splendid?”{PAUSE}“It is that kind of dullness
that makes you a second-rate scientist.”

Rufus
“What's happening?”

Scarlet
“It's coming from within the wall!
Something's in there! It's moving!”

Hojo
“Weapon…”

Hojo
“Then it really does exist…
I didn't believe in it.”

Rufus
“What does this mean?”

Hojo
“…Weapon.
A monster created by the Planet.”{PAUSE}“They appear when the Planet's in danger
and destroy everything.”{PAUSE}“That's what was stated in
Professor Gast's report.”

Rufus
“I never saw that report…
Where is it?”

Hojo
“Here, right here.”

Rufus
“You keep a lot of things to yourself.”

Scarlet
“Mr. President…
I've got a bad feeling about this place…”

Rufus
“Hmm…maybe we should
go back to our ship now.”{PAUSE}“We need to prepare for
the inspection anyway.”

Scarlet
“Hey!!!
Where did you come from?”

{Cloud}
“…Don't know…”

{Cloud}
“This place is going to get rough.”{PAUSE}“Better leave things to me
and get out of here while you still can!!”

Rufus
“Leave things to you?
Hmph…I don't know what you mean.”

{Cloud}
“This is where the Reunion is happening.
Where everything begins and ends.”

{Tifa}
“{Cloud}?”

{Barret}
“Hey!
We're here to help you!”

{Red XIII}
“I'm here!
I'm here to help you, {Cloud}!”

{Cloud}
“Thanks…{Barret}.
Where's the Black Materia?”

{Cloud}
“Thanks…{Red XIII}.
Where's the Black Materia?”

{Barret}
“It's safe.
I have it.”

{Red XIII}
“It's safe.
I'm holding on to it.”

{Cloud}
“I'll take it from here.
Give me the…Black Materia.”

{Barret}
“You alright?”

{Red XIII}
“Are you all right, {Cloud}?”

{Barret}
“Okay then, here.
Had a lot of pressure holding this thing.”

{Red XIII}
“Then…here you go.
I was a little apprehensive holding this thing.”

{Cloud}
“Thanks.
Leave the rest to me.”

{Cloud}
“Sorry to make you worry,
but I'm all right now.”

{Cloud}
“I'll make sure that the
Black Materia is delivered.”

{Tifa}
“{Cloud}!!”
<fe>{RED}Come on. The Black Materia…<fe>{RED}
<fe>{GRAY}Please wait! Just a little longer!!<fe>{GRAY}

{Cloud}
“Everyone, thanks for everything.
And…I'm sorry.”

{Cloud}
“…Sorry.”

{Cloud}
“…Sorry.”

{Cloud}
“Especially you, {Tifa}.
I'm really sorry.”{PAUSE}“You've been so good to me…
I don't know what to say…”

{Cloud}
“I never lived up to
being '{Cloud}'.”{PAUSE}“{Tifa}…
Maybe one day you'll meet
the real '{Cloud}'.”

{Cloud}
“Professor Hojo…”

Hojo
“Ha,ha,ha…
this is perfect!!!”{PAUSE}“It means that my experiment was
a complete success.”

Hojo
“What number were you?
Huh? Where is your tattoo?”

{Cloud}
“Professor Hojo…
I don't have a number.”{PAUSE}“You didn't give me one because you said
I was a failed experiment.”

Hojo
“What?”

Hojo
“What the--?
You mean only a failure
made it here?”

{Cloud}
“I didn't know the 'Reunion' already started.”{PAUSE}“But, here I am.
And I brought the Black Materia with me
Just as Sephiroth wanted.”

Hojo
“Shut up, miserable failure…”

{Cloud}
“Professor…please give me a number.
Please, Professor…”

{Cloud}
“Won't you give me one? …Professor?”

Hojo
“I never dreamed what I thought
was a success…was actually a failure,
and that which I considered a
failure was my greatest success…”

Rufus
“What are you guys talking about?”

{Tifa}
“You can't hear my voice?”

{Tifa}
“You can't hear my voice?”

{Tifa}
“No, don't!!!
Please! Stop {Cloud}!”

{Tifa}
“{Cloud}!!”

Hojo
“Did you see it!! It's Sephiroth!
So he IS here!”

Hojo
“This is perfect!
Both Jenova's Reunion and Sephiroth's will!”{PAUSE}“They won't be diffused
into the Lifestream,”{PAUSE}“but gathered here!
Mwa, haa, ha…”

{Tifa}
“What are you so happy about, Professor?
You know what this means, don't you?”

{Tifa}
“{Cloud} has the Black Materia!”

{Tifa}
“Sephiroth is going to summon Meteor!
Every single person is going to die!”

Rufus
“Whatever I say now is too little…
too late. We must evacuate.”

Rufus
“I want you all to come with me.
There's still much more I want to know.”

{Barret}
“Yo! {Cloud}!
Stop! Don't do it!”

{Red XIII}
“{Cloud}, NO!
